website_summaries.verdict: The best choice of hair dryer for people wanting premium performance in a relatively small, portable package.
pros: Heating element acts quickly, making the hair drying process faster than other models
Has settings controls that are easy to reach while in use
Lower volume than other common hair dryers
cons: Somewhat heavier than other dryers due to the bulky build

customer_reviews.title: I had this exact dryer for cosmo school and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact dryer for cosmo school and it lasted me 8 years so of course I re-ordered the same!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Motor burnt up after a few months use
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this dryer. Works really well, high powered, and quiet. But the concentrator nozzle doesn't stay on- flies off in the middle of drying, then it's too hot to put back on. After 5 months, the dryer itself started squealing and smelling burnt. I would not recommend this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: CGreene

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty impressed with this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional hairstylist and have bought numerous dryers over the years... Some inexpensive, some very pricey.. I am pretty impressed with this dryer. It is quiet yet has alot of power. First time I used it was on a client with very thick wavy hair who likes a smooth finish. This dryer performed very well! Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Judy W

customer_reviews.title: Another Dead BaByliss
customer_reviews.text: No more BaByliss. Sorry, bought this to replace my other BaByliss that broke. Now 3 months after using this one for 5 minutes each morning it started squealing so loud that it was scary! Kept using it hoping that the problem would work itself out and it smells like it is burning. No easy way to take it apart to see if I can fix it. Will never purchase another expensive dryer from this company again. Also, no warrantee information shown on their listings. Better to purchase a cheaper unit and a backup unit if needed. I really expected more as I actually consider these to be professional units.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time today and it is worth every penny I spent! My hair dried smoother than my regular dryer. My hair feels like it does when I leave the salon. I didn't even need to flat iron as normal. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hairdryer; it dries my hair pretty quickly and it's a good size and not very heavy, but it doesn't seem to smooth out my hair as nicely as my last hair dryer, which was a CHI.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lotosky

customer_reviews.title: I'd give 5 stars because this is a great dryer but I gave it 3 because the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 5 stars because this is a great dryer but I gave it 3 because the first one I ordered didn't work right, the second one had a filter falling off constantly. But, this 3rd one is great. Hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: ericka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The blow dryer adds tons of volume to my hair. Expensive as hell but with my fine, limp hair I can't live without it now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Not for Medium to Long Length Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price that I would love this blow dryer but it just isn't for my hair type. It is so powerful, which dries hair fast but, it leaves my hair knotted up and frizzy. My hair is medium to long length but fine. If you are looking for a styling blow dryer, this isn't the one. I would've returned it but I threw away the box too soon (lesson learned).
customer_reviews.author: Loraine

customer_reviews.title: it only blows cold air now and therefore is useless. I'm very disappointed with this buy Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer never worked right from the first month. It overheats and stops working, then I have to wait about 3 to 5 minutes for it to reset. I owned the same exact one for 7 years and never had this problem with it. I figured since it has that disclaimer on it that it might overheat, I might as well keep it. After only 1 year this product stopped blowing warm or hot air, it only blows cold air now and therefore is useless. I'm very disappointed with this buy Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than buying a cheapy from Target at a fraction ...
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer stopped working after seven months. Not any better than buying a cheapy from Target at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Obsessed!

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else -- didn't last more than 2-1/2 months :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer in November, 2018. It's now February 2019 and my window for product support and returns has closed. For the last 2 weeks, the dryer has been making awful squealing sounds when you turn it on and now the burning smell makes this dryer unusable. For the price, I would highly recommend buying another dryer. Very disappointed and would never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Zemanek

customer_reviews.title: squealing and has a burnt plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: its only a few months old and already its failing to work right, motor squeals and then it gives off a burnt plastic smell. will be contacting customer service to try and get a replacement under warranty
customer_reviews.author: Frank J  Cavaleri  Jr

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in beauty school and the hair dryer they issued her broke very quickly so I purchased this one for her. she has been using it every day in a commercial setting for 4 months now and it still works like new. I purchased this as recommended from several professional hair stylist who use this same hair dryer for a very long time daily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert PettyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second BaByliss. The heating element on the first one broke after less than a year. My second one overheats and shuts off automatically. I will never buy another. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jclaire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one that I've bought. <3 months after purchase it smells like burning. Amazon won't take it back for the full amount. Very disappointed in both Amazon and the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: I bought this hair dryer back in November 2017. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer back in November 2017. In 6 months the hair dryer played out. It will run for a minute or two and then shut off. Also, the nozzle will not stay on the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne knott

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it does burn out!
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the negative reviews, We initially really liked this hair Dryer and then over time our dryer started to have that "something is burning" smell. The negative reviews are consistent. As such, i could not recommend that someone purchases this unit.
customer_reviews.author: MarvE

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe a hair dryer can make this big ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe a hair dryer can make this big of a difference, but it really does. My hair looks shinier and my fly-aways are almost non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: and loved it to begin with however as of today 6/1/2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blow dryer in February of this year (2017), and loved it to begin with however as of today 6/1/2017 it is broken. It started smoking and making an awful sound. A blow dryer should definitely last longer than 4 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Meade

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February 2017 and for the past 3 weeks it has been shutting off on me while in use. I was hoping this would be a good product but now I need to replace it with one that doesn't over heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worst blow dryer ever
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spend a little extra money on this blow dryer because it had decent reviews. This is the worst blow dryer I have ever used in my life. Worst buy from Amazon by far. It gets extremely hot, the attachment piece fly's off easily, it tangles your hair like crazy, and it makes your hair frizzy. I have never had any blow dryer I own tangle my hair so badly while blow drying it. DO NOT BUY. I cannot even return it because I threw away the box and recent. Jessica
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Blowdryer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blow dryer. It dries my hair faster than the cheaper brands. The attachment gets really hot so be careful, but other than that, I really like this blow dryer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST hair dryer aside from the dyson one in my opinion. I have tried so many, including dyson and nothing beats those two. I even bought the $250+ BaByliss Italia Brava hairdryer and it didn’t compare to this at all. Excellent quality, quick drying time, easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I had mine for 9yrs never complained.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blower I don't know why or how some are having issues 🤔. I bought my first one back in 2008 and had it til this month the motor finally decide it was time to rest lol. SO am happy I get to buy to the same one. I had Dyson and it was good but is all preferences and am used to this one. 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: lianmy

customer_reviews.title: Styles my hair exactly the way I want
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and dries my hair at night very quickly. Also, I use this in the morning to style my hair and this is amazing. It shapes my hair the way I want it and doesn't damage my hair like other blowdryers. I think this is worth the money to spend if you are looking for a hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Nakul M.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This is not good as good as my last babyliss product. It’s kind of cheap and doesn’t have as good of a handhold as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Seemed cheap and left in the rain on my porch
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little cheap. I didn’t end up using it because it was shipped in original packaging and left on my porch in the rain by the delivery people so I was afraid to plug it in and try it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Broadus

customer_reviews.title: A little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great hair dryer for the most part. My only real complaint is that it's kind of heavy and my arms get tired when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Connieb (Connie's Creations)

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a BaBylissPro Dryer that I've had for over 5 years. This one cost more, and it wasn't as powerful. Additionally, I wasn't a fan of the button placement.
customer_reviews.author: TakosTuesday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dryer. It cut down dry time in half and left hair smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anisis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great blow dryer, it’s quiet, has a long cord and dries my hair fast.
customer_reviews.author: RRK

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer works great. It gets very hot and can dry hair quickly. The only downside is that it is a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, does a great job! However, it doesn’t last long. A little over a year and it stopped working for me. :( I’ve been trough 2 already with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aline Sousa Decker

customer_reviews.title: This hair dryer worked great for the first few months then one day started ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer worked great for the first few months then one day started making a horrible sound and started burning inside the motor. Very disappointed with the performance of this product especially for the price paid. I would guess that this was a knockoff and not an original BaByliss product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why take a chance on a defective one when there are so many other, better options to choose from?
customer_reviews.text: Mine also stopped working after 6 months. It smelled like it was burning and then only blew cold air. I now have to pay shipping to return it, and I have to include $5 for them to ship a new one. And no hair dryer for a couple of weeks to boot. So much hassle and definitely not worth it. So many reviewers have the same problem where the motor smells and then blows cold air. Why take a chance and hope that you didn't get a defective dryer when there are so many other, better options to choose from?
customer_reviews.author: PattiH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this hair dryer. My husband bought me this same hair dryer 5 years ago and it was the BEST! Then my 1 year old knocked it off the counter and broke it so I decided to buy the exact same one from amazon. I have had this new one now for only a few months and it started giving off a smokey smell when in use it. It also rattles when in use. Very disappointed and worried that it is a safety hazard. Needless to say I think I need a new blow dryer again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a 'Turbo professional' that I've owned for the past 5 years, & it was time for me to make a change, do to that it was leaving my hair frizzy & not straight. I have curly hair... I decided to try a new brand, & with the previous reviews posted about this blower, i decided to give it a try. Completely satisfied! I mean, so far I've only used it once, but def did the job..It convinced me. Blows out my roots like in the salon, its like having a flat iron (which i don't use) & a blower all in one! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer on Feb. 7 of 2017. It's a good dryer drys the hair fast. was doing good until it started cutting off while I was blowing my clients hair, I let it set for about 5 min. Then it started working again until Jan of this year it started blowing out cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Bbt

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I do wish it was a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the hair dryer I've been waiting for. It is comparable to the one my hair dresser uses. I love it! I do wish it was a bit lighter weight but it is fine. I am so pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This dryer BLOWS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dryer is fantastic! A little disappointed it didn't come with the comb attachment, but it performs like a salon quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Djules

customer_reviews.title: But the airflow dries my hair a bit faster and the balance of the dryer makes it easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Not really a difference I could tell using "ions" for fly-away hair. But the airflow dries my hair a bit faster and the balance of the dryer makes it easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great..
customer_reviews.text: This works great...I had this product before and it had a heavier cord, so that would be my only complaint is they went to a lighter electrical cord.
customer_reviews.author: Christian L Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this product unless you want to waste your money cause you can't return it
customer_reviews.text: I owned this blow drier for 3 months and it is broken. It smells and is about to catch on fire. Never buy this product unless you want to waste your money cause you can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about six months, very powerful and fast drying leaving hair smooth and full of body, but suddenly stopped working with no warning. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ljc4230

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, this is the second Babyliss hairdryer in ...
customer_reviews.text: Motor went out after 5 months of use. Poor quality, this is the second Babyliss hairdryer in 24 months, moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Burnt smell/harsh dryer
customer_reviews.text: Same, I wish I read the reviews because I bought mine January and now we are in May and it always smells like a burnt motor. Who wants their hair to smell like anything burnt? I also think it’s been drying out my hair. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: The product did not come in a box. just ...
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come in a box. just a label stuck onto the original product package. It was a gift and the box was wet and destroyed so I could not give it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer was AMAZING till the motor slowly stopped working after only 5 months of normal daily use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolin

customer_reviews.title: I love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer, but sometimes it has a burning smell to it. For the price, I didn't expect any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M

customer_reviews.title: doesnt last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer a year ago to this day. It fried today with smoke and all! Thank goodness i noticed before my hair fried! I would think this would last more than a year. Going to see if i can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette V.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to revise my review.. it has been 1 year and 1 month since I purchase this product and it is not heating. this is not a cheap airdryer to me failing in 1 year of purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Maria Casas

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a touch more powerful, but it is good enough. My hair dries quickly :).

customer_reviews.title: heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: this dryer is heavy but works great - thought it would be lighter to handle.
customer_reviews.author: nancyann

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hairdryer less than 6 months and it's already broken. I heard a click like something inside malfunctioned, and then it started to smoke. It won't turn back on and I'm out $80!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C

customer_reviews.title: diffuser sucks
customer_reviews.text: good hairdryer but the diffuser at the end pops off too easily and its soooooo frustrating. won't buy again

customer_reviews.title: This item was deposit in the USPS on Nov 21 2018.
customer_reviews.text: This item was deposit in the USPS on Nov 21 2018.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful dryer and surprisingly quiet. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It's a little heavy if you have wrist problems.
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've purchased this dryer. So good! Powerful blower and just-right-hot. Drying my hair is fast with this.
customer_reviews.author: ldouglas1996

customer_reviews.title: Little bit pricey for me the wife loves it the ...
customer_reviews.text: Little bit pricey for me the wife loves it the first one she bought lasted 10 years blow drying her hair everyday she also likes the long cord
customer_reviews.author: Seth k.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the dryer. Only drawback is it is a little on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dryer. Less expensive than those I have had prior, but just as good or better.

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Shipped to me just like this. No outer box or protection. Luckily I plugged it in and it works. Who ships a product like this?
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fire and safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until the inner screen, which was obviously glued poorly, came free, shot into the barrel and nearly lit fire as it sprayed hundreds of tiny hot plastic fragments into my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best hairdryer. I have long thick hair and it dries my hair very fast and doesn’t damage it.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought and she says it's the best hair drier ever.

customer_reviews.title: The dryer it self I like it but I think they are better out there ...
customer_reviews.text: The attachment does not stay on. It falls as your blow drying. The dryer it self I like it but I think they are better out there if you are willing to spend.

customer_reviews.title: I like this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional of 25 years. I like this dryer. BaByliss is top notch. They make Rusk dryers as well.

customer_reviews.title: DIED AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: The hair dyer was great but died after 3 months of using. That is very disappointing considering it was 70 bucks. Will not buy from this seller again.

customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer! Salon like! My hairstylist said this is the only one she uses. I can see why.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dryer

customer_reviews.title: The best hair dryer ever
customer_reviews.text: The best hair dryer ever. So worth the money. My friend had it and that's why I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Best blow dryer. Has a long lasting life of 2-3 years. Just bought my second one as a back up. My first one that I bought in 2015 is still working.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hairdryer ever! My second time buying to have one for the guest bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: BaBylissPRO brand has always been known for being good. I also have their flat iron which is ...
customer_reviews.text: BaBylissPRO brand has always been known for being good. I also have their flat iron which is a good component to this blow dryer. They both leave ny hair feeling softer and with long lasting effect. I never knew a blow dryer had such a big impact in the outcome of your hair. Everyday you learn something new.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a year old, smells like it is burning and making a loud squealing noise. Has a 3 year warranty but I can’t figure out how to return.
customer_reviews.author: Shari H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer for natural curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Best blow dryer!!! I have really curly hair and have tried every blow dryer.... but this one is great. No frizz after and Hair looks/feels silky.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer, if it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in September 2018 and the item burnt out and no longer works.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it get hot...Which I like because my hair is very fine

customer_reviews.text: I love this blower. I have freezy hair and usualluy har to dry, and with this blower I dont have to use my iron.

customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has ethnic hair and it takes me half the time to blow dry his hair.

customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as my old hairdryer and it dries my hair really fast.

customer_reviews.title: Regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Does not blow near as hard as I thought. Regret the purchase. It is heavy as well. I am a flight attendant where weight in luggage is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: I love my Babyliss pro
customer_reviews.text: I love my Babyliss pro! It is awesome for my thick hair. Dries in 1/2 the time. The little diffuser won't stay on but I use it without it.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: OK, but the higher end BaBlissPro dryers are much better!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is pretty good, but I found it at a much better price at Harmon Face Values—and they take retailmetnot coupons for Bed Bath & Beyond. But better than that, you can test out so many of the dryers before you buy. I was much happier buying in person—because I found a higher-end model and the salesperson told me about the coupons so I was able to afford it. Ultimately, I went for a higher-end BaBlyssPro ItaliaBravia. I have curly hair and it is great with the BaByliss Italian Series Snap-On Diffuser, which I had to buy elsewhere online only. I wasn't able to find the diffuser on Amazon, but maybe they have it now.
customer_reviews.author: Zazeyay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This dryer saves me t least five minutes every morning of my life. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer! It dries my hair quickly and without frying it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bull

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in February2017. Lasted 3 months. Overheats and shuts off during usage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hindley

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lasted longer....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blowdrier but it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer has cut my hair drying time in half. My hair is so shiny after drying. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been using BaByliss Pro dryers for years and always happy with their product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using BaByliss Pro dryers for years and always happy with their product. I'm writing this just to say beware as this last one which I had for 9 months ran very hot......so most of the time was using the medium setting. I use the dryer twice a week. A few days ago the dryer started making a screeching noise and then smelt like some type of chemical. I've stopped using it as it is clearly defective. I should have returned it right away when it was running hot......that was my bad. So if you get one, pay attention to its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long!!! But Mfg did replace
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Feb 9 2017. It is now March 25 and the dryer smells " a burnt" smell when using. It is now past the return date so I am stuck with it. Contacted mfg direct. They are replacing with a new dryer. Very Nice!!
customer_reviews.author: JimL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
